section.title: Introduction
section.para: crystal-facet-uml creates diagrams to document system and software architecture.
Like a crystal shows different facets of the same thing, this application shows different views of the same system/software.

section.title: Goal
section.para: As software architect, you create a set of diagrams describing use-cases, requirements, structural views, behavioral and deployment views.
These views show selected elements and their relationships. crystal-facet-uml keeps element names and element hierarchies consistent.

This tool runs on your local PC. It stores the model data in a json-based file which can be stored in git, branched and merged together with your source code. crystal-facet-uml exports diagrams in svg, pdf, ps and png formats which can be used in text processing systems like DocBook, html, LaTeX.
